text: Saropogon velutinus is a species of Brachycera in the family of Asilidae (assassin flies). The scientific name of the species was first published in 1962 Carrera & Papvero. ==References== "Saropogon velutinus Carrera & Papavero, 1962." GBIF.org, 3 Nov. 2014. Web. . Category:Asilidae
title: Saropogon velutinus
